ChunkText: ph.d. students must upload an official transcript because the diploma does not show the name of your program. remember: your employer must be enrolled and participating in e-verify!
ContextBefore: download a draft snapshot of your form i-765 application here see below electronic filing help for instructions on using the uscis online application system submit a complete stem OPT request in the isss portal upload the following: form i-983 training plan with all required signatures draft snapshot of your form i-765 copy of official transcript or diploma the transcript should clearly state your program major and the date when the degree was conferred or awarded.
ContextAfter: electronic filing help step 2: submit form i-765 application to uscis the isss office will review each stem OPT request and email the student about any potential edits students should make on their draft form i-765. students will also be able to view their stem OPT I-20 in their request.
